title: Invitation to tender: Monitoring & Evaluation practitioner

details.excerpt: Experienced monitoring and evaluation practitioner to advise on ODI's monitoring and evaluation framework and tools
details.alternative_title: Invitation to tender: Monitoring & Evaluation practitioner
details.content:
Experienced monitoring and evaluation practitioner to advise on ODI's monitoring and evaluation framework and tools

The objective of this work is to advise the Open Data Institute (ODI) on our approach to monitoring and evaluating leadership support activities for open data initiatives in developing countries (for next 6 months), including through applying action research methods.

The main output of the work will be a brief report and/or slide deck containing practical recommendations regarding monitoring indicators, methodology and practical tools for data collection.

The researcher will support a team at the ODI who are implementing leadership support activities across a number of countries internationally (including Macedonia, Tanzania, Burkina Faso) during July-September 2015.

A full brief can be found here

Tender responses should be delivered to fiona.smith@theodi.org by Monday 29 June at 9.00 BST.
